00027 var CPThemeStatePressed = CPThemeState("pressed");
00028 
00029 @implementation _CPTableColumnHeaderView : CPView
00030 {
00031     CPTextField _textField;

00033 
00034 - (void)initWithFrame:(CGRect)frame
00035 {
00036     self = [super initWithFrame:frame];
00037     if (self)
00038     {   
00039         _textField = [[CPTextField alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(5, 1, CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]) - 5, CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]) - 1)];
00040         [_textField setAutoresizingMask:CPViewWidthSizable|CPViewHeightSizable];
00041         [_textField setTextColor: [CPColor colorWithHexString: @"333333"]];
00042         [_textField setValue:[CPFont boldSystemFontOfSize:12.0] forThemeAttribute:@"font"];
00043         [_textField setValue:CPLeftTextAlignment forThemeAttribute:@"alignment"];
00044         [_textField setVerticalAlignment:CPCenterVerticalTextAlignment];
00045         [_textField setValue:CGSizeMake(0,1) forThemeAttribute:@"text-shadow-offset"];
00046             [_textField setValue:[CPColor whiteColor] forThemeAttribute:@"text-shadow-color"];
00047 
00048 
00049         [self addSubview:_textField];
00050     }
00051     
00052     return self;
00053 }
00054 
00055 - (void)layoutSubviews
00056 {
00057     var themeState = [self themeState];
00058 
00059     if((themeState & CPThemeStateSelected) && (themeState & CPThemeStatePressed))
00060         [self setBackgroundColor:[CPColor colorWithPatternImage:CPAppKitImage("tableview-headerview-highlighted-pressed.png", CGSizeMake(1.0, 22.0))]];
00061     else if (themeState == CPThemeStateSelected)
00062         [self setBackgroundColor:[CPColor colorWithPatternImage:CPAppKitImage("tableview-headerview-highlighted.png", CGSizeMake(1.0, 22.0))]];
00063     else if (themeState == CPThemeStatePressed)
00064         [self setBackgroundColor:[CPColor colorWithPatternImage:CPAppKitImage("tableview-headerview-pressed.png", CGSizeMake(1.0, 22.0))]];
00065     else 
00066         [self setBackgroundColor:[CPColor colorWithPatternImage:CPAppKitImage("tableview-headerview.png", CGSizeMake(1.0, 22.0))]];
00067 }

00095 @implementation CPTableHeaderView : CPView
00096 {
00097     int _resizedColumn @accessors(readonly, property=resizedColumn);
00098     int _draggedColumn @accessors(readonly, property=draggedColumn);
00099     int _pressedColumn @accessors(readonly, property=pressedColumn);
00100     
00101     float _draggedDistance @accessors(readonly, property=draggedDistance);
00102     float _lastLocation;
00103     float _columnOldWidth;
00104     
00105     CPTableView _tableView @accessors(property=tableView);
00106 }
00107 
00108 - (void)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00109 {
00110     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00111 
00112     if (self)
00113     {
00114         _resizedColumn = CPNotFound;
00115         _draggedColumn = CPNotFound;
00116         _pressedColumn = CPNotFound;
00117         _draggedDistance = 0.0;
00118         _lastLocation = nil;
00119         _columnOldWidth = nil;
00120         
00121         [self setBackgroundColor:[CPColor colorWithPatternImage:CPAppKitImage("tableview-headerview.png", CGSizeMake(1.0, 22.0))]];
00122     }
00123 
00124     return self;
00125 }
00126 
00127 - (int)columnAtPoint:(CGPoint)aPoint
00128 {
00129     if (!CGRectContainsPoint([self bounds], aPoint))
00130         return CPNotFound;
00131 
00132     // at this point, we can essentially ignore height, because all columns have equal heights
00133     // and that height is equal to the height of our own bounds, which we know we are inside of
00134 
00135     var index = 0,
00136         count = [[_tableView tableColumns] count],
00137         tableSpacing = [_tableView intercellSpacing],
00138         tableColumns = [_tableView tableColumns],
00139         leftOffset = 0,
00140         pointX = aPoint.x;
00141 
00142     for (; index < count; index++)
00143     {
00144         var width = [tableColumns[index] width] + tableSpacing.width;
00145 
00146         if (pointX >= leftOffset && pointX < leftOffset + width)
00147             return index;
00148 
00149         leftOffset += width;
00150     }
00151 
00152     return CPNotFound;
00153 }
00154 
00155 - (CGRect)headerRectOfColumn:(int)aColumnIndex
00156 {
00157     var tableColumns = [_tableView tableColumns],
00158         tableSpacing = [_tableView intercellSpacing],
00159         bounds = [self bounds];
00160 
00161     if (aColumnIndex < 0 || aColumnIndex > [tableColumns count])
00162         [CPException raise:"invalid" reason:"tried to get headerRectOfColumn: on invalid column"];
00163 
00164     // UPDATE COLUMN RANGES ?
00165     if (_tableView._dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex !== CPNotFound)
00166         [_tableView _recalculateTableColumnRanges];
00167         
00168     var tableRange = _tableView._tableColumnRanges[aColumnIndex];
00169     bounds.origin.x = tableRange.location;
00170     bounds.size.width = tableRange.length;
00171     
00172     return bounds;
00173 }
00174 
00175 - (CPRect)_resizeRectBeforeColumn:(CPInteger)column
00176 {
00177     if (!([_tableView._tableColumns[column] resizingMask] & CPTableColumnUserResizingMask))
00178         return CGRectMakeZero();
00179         
00180     var rect = [self headerRectOfColumn:column];
00181 
00182     rect.origin.x -= 10;
00183     rect.size.width = 20;
00184 
00185     return rect;
00186 }
00187 
00188 - (void)_setPressedColumn:(CPInteger)column
00189 {
00190     if (_pressedColumn != CPNotFound)
00191     {
00192         var headerView = [_tableView._tableColumns[_pressedColumn] headerView];
00193         [headerView unsetThemeState:CPThemeStatePressed];
00194     }    
00195     
00196     if (column != CPNotFound)
00197     {
00198         var headerView = [_tableView._tableColumns[column] headerView];
00199         [headerView setThemeState:CPThemeStatePressed];
00200     }
00201     
00202     _pressedColumn = column;
00203 }
00204 
00205 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)theEvent
00206 {
00207     var mouseLocation = [self convertPoint:[theEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil],
00208         clickedColumn = [self columnAtPoint:mouseLocation];    
00209     
00210     if (clickedColumn == -1)
00211         return;
00212     
00213     [_tableView _sendDelegateDidMouseDownInHeader:clickedColumn];
00214     
00215     var resizeLocation = CGPointMake(mouseLocation.x + 10, mouseLocation.y),
00216         resizedColumn = [self columnAtPoint:resizeLocation] - 1;
00217     
00218     // 2 different tracking methods: one for resizing/stop-resizing, another one for selection/reordering
00219     if ([_tableView allowsColumnResizing] 
00220         && resizedColumn >= 0 
00221         && CGRectContainsPoint([self _resizeRectBeforeColumn:(resizedColumn + 1)], mouseLocation))
00222     {
00223         _resizedColumn = resizedColumn;
00224         [_tableView._tableColumns[_resizedColumn] setDisableResizingPosting:YES];
00225         [self trackResizeWithEvent:theEvent];
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         [self _setPressedColumn:clickedColumn];
00230         [self trackMouseWithEvent:theEvent];
00231     }    
00232 }
00233 
00234 - (void)trackMouseWithEvent:(CPEvent)theEvent
00235 {
00236     var type = [theEvent type];
00237     
00238     if (type == CPLeftMouseUp)
00239     {
00240         var location = [self convertPoint:[theEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil],
00241             clickedColumn = [self columnAtPoint:location];
00242 
00243         [self _setPressedColumn:CPNotFound];
00244         
00245         if (clickedColumn == -1)
00246             return;    
00247         
00248         [_tableView _sendDelegateDidClickColumn:clickedColumn];
00249         
00250         if ([_tableView allowsColumnSelection])
00251         {        
00252             if ([theEvent modifierFlags] & CPCommandKeyMask)
00253             {
00254                 if ([_tableView isColumnSelected:clickedColumn])
00255                     [_tableView deselectColumn:clickedColumn];
00256                 else if ([_tableView allowsMultipleSelection] == YES)
00257                     [_tableView selectColumnIndexes:[CPIndexSet indexSetWithIndex:clickedColumn]  byExtendingSelection:YES];
00258             }
00259             else if ([theEvent modifierFlags] & CPShiftKeyMask)
00260             {
00261             // should be from clickedColumn to lastClickedColum with extending:(direction == previous selection)
00262                 var selectedIndexes = [_tableView selectedColumnIndexes],
00263                     startColumn = MIN(clickedColumn, [selectedIndexes lastIndex]),
00264                     endColumn = MAX(clickedColumn, [selectedIndexes firstIndex]);
00265             
00266                 [_tableView selectColumnIndexes:[CPIndexSet indexSetWithIndexesInRange:CPMakeRange(startColumn, endColumn - startColumn + 1)] byExtendingSelection:YES];
00267             }
00268             else
00269                 [_tableView selectColumnIndexes:[CPIndexSet indexSetWithIndex:clickedColumn] byExtendingSelection:NO];
00270         }
00271         return;
00272     }
00273 /*
00274     else if (type & CPLeftMouseDragged && [_tableView allowsColumnREordering])
00275     {
00276         // Start dragging here   
00277         [[CPCursor closedHandCursor] set];
00278         return;
00279     }
00280 */        
00281     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackMouseWithEvent:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask | CPLeftMouseDownMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00282 }
00283 
00284 - (void)trackResizeWithEvent:(CPEvent)anEvent
00285 {
00286     var location = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil],
00287         tableColumn = [[_tableView tableColumns] objectAtIndex:_resizedColumn],
00288         type = [anEvent type];
00289 
00290     if (_lastLocation == nil) _lastLocation = location;
00291     if (_columnOldWidth == nil) _columnOldWidth = [tableColumn width];
00292         
00293     if (type === CPLeftMouseUp)
00294     {   
00295         [self _updateResizeCursor:anEvent];
00296                 
00297         [tableColumn _postDidResizeNotificationWithOldWidth:_columnOldWidth];
00298         [tableColumn setDisableResizingPosting:NO];
00299         
00300         _resizedColumn = CPNotFound;
00301         _lastLocation = nil;
00302         _columnOldWidth = nil;     
00303         return;
00304     }            
00305     else if (type === CPLeftMouseDragged)
00306     {
00307         var newWidth = [tableColumn width] + location.x - _lastLocation.x;
00308         
00309         if (newWidth >= [tableColumn minWidth])
00310         {
00311             [tableColumn setWidth:newWidth];
00312             // FIXME: there has to be a better way to do this...
00313             // We should refactor the auto resizing crap.
00314             // We need to figure out the exact cocoa behavior here though. 
00315             [_tableView resizeWithOldSuperviewSize:[_tableView bounds]];
00316             _lastLocation = location;
00317                         
00318             [[CPCursor resizeLeftRightCursor] set];
00319             [self setNeedsLayout];
00320             [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00321         }
00322         else
00323             [[CPCursor resizeRightCursor] set];
00324     }
00325     
00326     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackResizeWithEvent:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00327 }
00328 
00329 - (void)_updateResizeCursor:(CPEvent)theEvent
00330 {
00331     var mouseLocation = [self convertPoint:[theEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00332     
00333     var mouseOverLocation = CGPointMake(mouseLocation.x + 10, mouseLocation.y),
00334         overColumn = [self columnAtPoint:mouseOverLocation];
00335     
00336     var isInside = (overColumn > 0 && CGRectContainsPoint([self _resizeRectBeforeColumn:overColumn], mouseLocation));
00337     if (isInside)
00338     {
00339         var column = [[_tableView tableColumns] objectAtIndex:overColumn - 1];
00340         if ([column width] == [column minWidth])
00341             [[CPCursor resizeRightCursor] set];
00342         else
00343             [[CPCursor resizeLeftRightCursor] set];
00344     }
00345     else
00346         [[CPCursor arrowCursor] set];
00347 }
00348 
00349 - (void)viewDidMoveToWindow
00350 {
00351     if ([_tableView allowsColumnResizing])
00352         [[self window] setAcceptsMouseMovedEvents:YES];
00353 }
00354 
00355 - (void)mouseEntered:(CPEvent)theEvent
00356 {   
00357     [self _updateResizeCursor:theEvent];
00358 }
00359 
00360 - (void)mouseMoved:(CPEvent)theEvent
00361 {
00362     [self _updateResizeCursor:theEvent];
00363 }
00364 
00365 - (void)mouseExited:(CPEvent)theEvent
00366 {
00367     // FIXME: we should use CPCursor push/pop (if previous currentCursor != arrow).
00368     [[CPCursor arrowCursor] set];
00369 }
00370 
00371 - (void)layoutSubviews
00372 {
00373     var tableColumns = [_tableView tableColumns],
00374         count = [tableColumns count];    
00375     
00376     for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) 
00377     {
00378         var column = [tableColumns objectAtIndex:i],
00379             headerView = [column headerView];
00380         
00381         var frame = [self headerRectOfColumn:i];
00382         frame.size.height -= 0.5;
00383         if (i > 0) 
00384         {
00385             frame.origin.x += 0.5;
00386             frame.size.width -= 1;
00387         }
00388         
00389         [headerView setFrame:frame];
00390         
00391         if([headerView superview] != self)
00392             [self addSubview:headerView];
00393     }
00394 }
00395 
00396 - (void)drawRect:(CGRect)aRect
00397 {
00398     var context = [[CPGraphicsContext currentContext] graphicsPort],
00399         exposedColumnIndexes = [_tableView columnIndexesInRect:aRect],
00400         columnsArray = [],
00401         tableColumns = [_tableView tableColumns],
00402         exposedTableColumns = _tableView._exposedColumns,
00403         firstIndex = [exposedTableColumns firstIndex],
00404         exposedRange = CPMakeRange(firstIndex, [exposedTableColumns lastIndex] - firstIndex + 1);
00405 
00406     CGContextSetLineWidth(context, 1);
00407     CGContextSetStrokeColor(context, [_tableView gridColor]);
00408 
00409     [exposedColumnIndexes getIndexes:columnsArray maxCount:-1 inIndexRange:exposedRange];
00410 
00411     var columnArrayIndex = 0,
00412         columnArrayCount = columnsArray.length,
00413         columnMaxX;
00414         
00415     CGContextBeginPath(context);
00416     for(; columnArrayIndex < columnArrayCount; columnArrayIndex++)
00417     {
00418         // grab each column rect and add vertical lines
00419         var columnIndex = columnsArray[columnArrayIndex],
00420             columnToStroke = [self headerRectOfColumn:columnIndex];
00421             
00422         columnMaxX = CGRectGetMaxX(columnToStroke);
00423         
00424         CGContextMoveToPoint(context, ROUND(columnMaxX) + 0.5, ROUND(CGRectGetMinY(columnToStroke)));
00425         CGContextAddLineToPoint(context, ROUND(columnMaxX) + 0.5, ROUND(CGRectGetMaxY(columnToStroke)));
00426     }
00427     
00428     CGContextClosePath(context);
00429     CGContextStrokePath(context);
00430         
00431 /*
00432     var maxY = CGRectGetMaxY([self bounds]);
00433     // draw normal gradient for remaining space
00434     if (supportsCanvasGradient)
00435     {
00436         aRect.origin.x = columnMaxX - 0.5;
00437         aRect.size.width -= columnMaxX;
00438         CGContextBeginPath(context);
00439         CGContextAddRect(context, CGRectMake(columnMaxX + 1, 0, CGRectGetMaxX([self bounds]) - columnMaxX, CGRectGetHeight([self bounds])));
00440         CGContextClosePath(context);    
00441         CGContextDrawLinearGradient(context, [_CPTableColumnHeaderView headerGradient], CGPointMake(0,0), CGPointMake(0, maxY - 1),0);
00442     }   
00443    
00444     // Draw bottom line
00445     CGContextBeginPath(context);    
00446     CGContextMoveToPoint(context, 0, maxY - 0.5);
00447     CGContextAddLineToPoint(context, CGRectGetMaxX([self bounds]), maxY - 0.5);
00448     CGContextClosePath(context);
00449     CGContextStrokePath(context);
00450 */   
00451 }
